channel.title: Zinc on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Zinc on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Blow
item.description: Have you ever. felt? The wind from. a thirsty. barren. wasteland. flow over you? like a disease that won't decay. then notice. out of nowhere. you're there! in the wasteland. looking staring at the void. the dunes of hollow. wondering what was once there. by then, it happens? you notice. You are the wasteland. spewing your wicked, decaying, breath. wind. on others. does this stop? will it end? the wind is speechless.

item.title: Sad
item.description: O harketh! Such a sad, sad day cometh! It IS heard. let us, me, fully embrace. the drink is sweet. yet taste is bitter! Such the sad, sad day Rises! Can it be toppled? it reigns the sons and daughters, me. echoes through the valleys makes the grass ShUdDeR. So much so, the pain. Such pain shatters. My existence, reality questioned. What lives of my being without such pain? O how such sad, sad days are suppressed.

item.title: Trench
item.description: what small pellets. THE FORCE IN ITS POSSESION. each unique, yet fiercely potent. THE STREAM, OH, MY DEAR, DEAR STREAM!!!!! the naive, small stream. LOOK, BE AWARE!!!! your substance can crush you. BREAK YOU DOWN! underground. DO YOU HEAR THE WARNING? no, the innocence is taken for granted. DO YOU SEE WHAT YOU ARE BLIND TO? hear THIS then, your doom is roaring to you. YOUR DEATH!! the killing sound.

item.title: Birds
item.description: can i see behind those lines? it is hard. and it is tricky to do. i see to and want. to know? do you see me? do you see behind this curved line on my head that some claim a smile? do you see that it’s a wince that makes my face that way. do you see that pain that’s wedged within me. Foolish! How could I have done this.

item.title: Chain
item.description: is this a joke? a rotten, putrid, sulfuric acidic silly, corrupt threatening joke? to make me fall. hard to the ground. i want to be near you, do you see? to be close to someone i hardly know. but do know, just the,same/ your hand is so far away. i can't see it. through it. are you thinking of me. this forgotten chamber locked in my chest, must know. tonight. of lifelessness the rhythm.

item.title: Strain
item.description: I know n o t where this tree has gone. was it not alive when i got here last? breathed here last? death is all it is! decayed like a black stain on the earth. me. i look all around, and it still stands. it still stands! but lifelessness consumes it. breaching it like death. the bushes are trampled underground! they stand no longer. i travel across the street, to meet

item.title: Gaze
item.description: I look into THis cRAZY thing. DOes it work? I do not see MySelf. Blackness. Darkness! Void. Nothing! I realize now that is what Iv'e BECOMe No, it is WoRking just fine it is I that is wrong AGaiN So what AM i to do? Where do i go? just stand. here. alone. by the mirror. holding it tight. it is all i have. isn't it? that i am UNAWARE. is there light?

item.title: Perch
item.description: charging. Breathing. am i perhaps, alive. in You? can i be? I want to. but i don't see it. a year seems so long, yet so so far away, a desolate country. but time makes you desolate right?

item.title: Bell
item.description: There is a light that I see, only partially. I want it. how do I get it? one might ask me. i try, but it's just out of reach. i hear a bell, love. i know not where it comes, but i want it please, i need help. can you see for me. a light shines and a bell rings, but is it for me? i feel it is, reaching for me, i can pull in, if i had the sight the moon, can i stand stand alone with it?

item.title: Coil
item.description: the youth now is far greater than my heart once conceived Perceived. i must. what i am now. think now. reconstruct. me. my life. for tomorrow. for another life. the past is what i behold tightly within me. through me. part of me. to let go is deaTH. i do not desire.

item.title: Words
item.description: these words. do they have, possess, power? some wish not. some die so. they must. how could i explain you if they couldn’t. idieSo. they mean everything to me. yet they are only symbols. but they are me. can i not express myself so openly. so profoundly. i need this word. this power. and i need you. too. is that wrong, as well. i die so.
